question: Samudra Shakti' is a bilateral exercise of India with which country?
explanation: The Bilateral Exercise \'Samudra Shakti\' 2019 was held between Indian Navy and Indonesian Navy in the Bay of Bengal. An Anti-Submarine Warfare Corvette INS Kamorta took part in the naval exercise. This year is the second edition of India, Indonesia Bilateral Naval Exercise. The inaugural edition of exercise was held at the port of Surabaya, Indonesia in November 2018.The objective is to strengthen bilateral relations, expand maritime co-operation, enhance inter-operability and exchange best practices between the Navies of India and Indonesia.
